channel.title: Help a noob! how do you join a server!?!? soo many questions
channel.description: OK, i'm new to all of this, my ifrst question is how do i join a server so i'm not the only fricken person playing this game!?!?!? also how do i save, my stuff like when i open mopar, i have to start a new sever and then i never can save it i always start off in varrock mines... !!!! then how do i play, and what do i do? do we always start off on lvlv 126? how do i join any server.... and then is there a noob guide to this?!

item.title: Help a noob! how do you join a server!?!? soo many questions
item.dc:creator: @ipkyouhaha ipkyouhaha
item.description:
@ipkyouhaha wrote:

go to rs2 private server advertisment… look for servers without hamachi…open moparscape and click file, than knew ip…type in the address, and enter any username and password. it my be offline, if you cant connect, try another one. you dont need to save, all servers auto save when you log out.

Read full topic
item.source: Help a noob! how do you join a server!?!? soo many questions

item.title: Help a noob! how do you join a server!?!? soo many questions

OK, i’m new to all of this, my ifrst question is how do i join a server so i’m not the only fricken person playing this game??? also how do i save, my stuff like when i open mopar, i have to start a new sever and then i never can save it i always start off in varrock mines… !!! then how do i play, and what do i do? do we always start off on lvlv 126? how do i join any server… and then is there a noob guide to this?!
